claim: Furia is directed by anyone except Alexandre Aja.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Furia is a 1999 French romantic drama film directed by Alexandre Aja , who co-wrote screenplay with Grégory Levasseur , adapted from the science fiction short story `` Graffiti '' by Julio Cortázar .

claim: Furia is directed by anyone except Alexandre Aja.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Grégory Levasseur  (  born 1979 in Douarnenez , France  )  is a French screenwriter and film producer , best known for The Hills Have Eyes  (  2006  )  , High Tension  (  2003  )  , Maniac  (  2012  )  Piranha 3-D  (  2010  )  , Mirrors  (  2008  )  , P2  (  2007  )  , and Furia  (  1999  )  , all of which he collaborated on with Alexandre Aja .
